entry.em: ..HEAT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT /8 PM EDT/ SUNDAY
entry.data: EXTREME HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING

PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 105 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
HUMID WITH LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 70S

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
